mapper.sql: OBJ_ID, USER_ID, TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, URL, CREATTIME, RELEASETIME, READNUM, SORT, RELEASE_STATUS,EXAMINE_STATUS, IS_VALID, IS_DEL ,REMARK,SELECT_CODE
mapper.select:
select
from g_sys_manage where OBJ_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR} and IS_DEL = '1' order by sort

select
from g_sys_manage where TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR} and (TITLE like concat('%','${searchContent}','%') or CONTENT like concat('%','${searchContent}','%')) and IS_DEL = '1' order by sort
mapper.insert: insert into g_sys_manage (OBJ_ID, USER_ID, TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, URL, CREATTIME, RELEASETIME, READNUM, SORT, RELEASE_STATUS,EXAMINE_STATUS, IS_VALID,IS_DEL,SELECT_CODE) values (#{objId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{releasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{releaseStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isValid,jdbcType=CHAR})

update g_sys_manage
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

RELEASETIME = #{releasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

RELEASE_STATUS = #{releaseStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},

IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=CHAR},
SELECT_CODE = #{selectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},,
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update g_sys_manage set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATTIME = #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RELEASETIME = #{releasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, READNUM = #{READNUM,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RELEASE_STATUS = #{releaseStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, EXAMINE_STATUS = #{EXAMINEStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=CHAR} SELECT_CODE = #{selectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OBJ_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update g_sys_manage set IS_DEL = '0' where OBJ_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
